verbs.description: First Lady Melania Trump [V: will] not be joining the president when he heads to Camp David Friday afternoon , three weeks after she was in the hospital for a kidney procedure .
First Lady Melania Trump will not [V: be] joining the president when he heads to Camp David Friday afternoon , three weeks after she was in the hospital for a kidney procedure .

[ARG0: First Lady Melania Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: not] be [V: joining] [ARG1: the president] [ARGM-TMP: when he heads to Camp David Friday afternoon , three weeks after she was in the hospital for a kidney procedure] .

First Lady Melania Trump will not be joining the president [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: heads] [ARG1: to Camp David] [ARGM-TMP: Friday afternoon , three weeks after she was in the hospital for a kidney procedure] .

First Lady Melania Trump will not be joining the president when he heads to Camp David Friday afternoon , three weeks after [ARG1: she] [V: was] [ARG2: in the hospital] [ARGM-PRP: for a kidney procedure] .
